title: Champion Spotlight Soundtrack?
body: Does anyone know the Soundtrack/Music in the Champion Spotlights? It started of from Tahm Kench. And I love the sound to it. {{champion:37}} @RIot

replies.body:
Hey KingGhidorah!

I'm TreblMuffin, the mixer on ol' Rito's sound squad. 

It's really cool that you like that music! The reason we don't have that anywhere online is because it's actually a suite of 3 different pieces that aren't recorded as a single whole. We have no plans at the moment to release that music, unfortunately :(

Back in February you said the sound team was going to publish it on the Internet.
Can't you just post the mixed version, the one used in the videos? 
I love this music but I'm getting a bit tired of listening to it with Phreak's voice x)

Trust me I'm sick of hearing Phreak's voice too. :P

Kiddin'. Love ya, buddy.

I do remember mentioning that in a thread a while back. To be completely transparent, I probably spoke too soon. Our team takes a lot of time and careful consideration when releasing content to players. As much as we might love something, it might not be ready or right to release. There might be a bazillion tiny reasons for this or just one very big one, but either way, it doesn't mean we don't hear you!
